titles.title: Energy Security and Independence Act of 2022
Energy Security and Independence Act of 2022
A bill to promote United States energy security and independence by bolstering renewable energy supply chains in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Energy Security and Independence Act of 2022
This bill addresses domestic industrial base and manufacturing capabilities for specified energy-efficiency and renewable energy systems and technologies (e.g., electric transportation systems), including by establishing a program to provide financial assistance for the construction of new facilities that manufacture components of specified energy-efficiency and renewable energy systems and technologies (or to retool, retrofit, or expand such facilities).
